title: neelambara sOdhara
sahitya:
nIlAmbara sOdara pAlaya mAm shrIdhara shrIla guruvAyupurEshvara dayAkara

anupallavi

 nIlAmbujAkSa vana mAlAdhara sudhIra lIlA mAnuSAkAra bAla nandakumAra

caraNam

 rAdhAramaNa ghanashyAma vishvAbhirAma rAk shashAnkAnana vallavAnvaya sOma
mAdhava nirupama suSamA vijita kAma mAdhavI vana tulasIdAma lOcanArAma
